s1.ptxt: When the engine is not running, make sure the IMT valve actuator (1) is at fully open position (2).
Check IMT valve actuator (1) according to the following procedure.

s2.ptxt: Connect special tool to IMT valve actuator (1) and then vacuum it.

attention2.ptxt: Never apply excessive vacuum more than standard value.

spec.title: Actuation vacuum specification
spec.ptxt: Standard value: –33 kpa (–0.3 kgf/cm², –4.79 psi, -0.33 bar)

s2.ptxt: Check that IMT valve actuator sets valve to fully closed position, and keeps fully closed.
With actuating valve to fully opened and closed positions several times, check that IMT valve actuator moves smoothly and properly.

s1.ptxt: If any abnormality is found, replace intake manifold assembly.
